siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

childMdx.excerpt: After learning about  Babel , I stumbled into the "is Babel a compiler or a transpiler?" debate. To help clarify things, I did a little research and illustrated it.
